reg_pit.acttitle: Farming and Fishing Industries Development Act
reg_pit.title: Grain Industry Development Fund Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "grain" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 112/2014, effective June 18, 2014.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: grain includes all grains, oilseeds, forage seeds and pulse crops grown by a grain producer in the Canadian Wheat Board designated area of the British Columbia Peace River region;

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "council" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 154/2017, effective July 28, 2017.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: council means the British Columbia Peace River Grain Development Council established by the minister under the Farming and Fishing Industries Development Act;

change.changenote: Part 1, heading was enacted by BC Reg 154/2017, effective July 28, 2017.
Section 2 (5) was added by BC Reg 154/2017, effective July 28, 2017.
Section 3 was enacted by BC Reg 154/2017, effective July 28, 2017.
Part 2 and section 4 were enacted by BC Reg 155/2017, effective August 1, 2017.
